author: Zack Budryk
title: Scientists say the coronavirus is not mutating quickly and might respond to a single vaccine
description: Scientists studying the novel coronavirus' genetic code say it does not appear to be mutating quickly, suggesting any vaccine developed for it will likely remain effective in the long term.Peter Thielen, a molecula...
content:
Scientists studying the novel coronavirus genetic code say it does not appear to be mutating quickly, suggesting any vaccine developed for it will likely remain effective in the long term.
Peter Thielen, a molecular geneticist at the Johns Hopkins University… [+1534 chars]
